attributes.review: My kid opened the app and was met with a Cheeto puff. He is now traumatized and currently attending therapy. All he wanted to do was learn about the orange 🍊 we have as president. But now he is scarred for life.
attributes.title: Kid with problems

attributes.review: first of all... donald trump is ugly and stupid. why is this an app. and ALSO, he dmed me and asked for feet pics like eww. and when i said no he robbed my house and left only my moms foot fungus remover😭😭
attributes.title: HORRIFIC

attributes.review: i was so excited to support our president through this app.. but when i opened it up, it was a picture of trump at the beach.... a nude beach. after that, i started getting tons of p0rn ads.. my phone has been hacked. i’m losing everything. my wife won’t text me back... help.
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: I opened the app to see a wrinkly carrot. It ain’t it chief. Wish I never downloaded it, this is full of practically pornography.

attributes.review: this app just popped up with the ugliest, most stale Cheeto I have ever seen. this app is horrible quality because of that Cheeto and it’s racist, homophobic and sexist acts.

attributes.review: Once I opened the app it was bad like it so bad I won’t get this app no more like no I stole my microwave like noooo I need that to cook hot pockets man and other stuff I need that back 😒

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app, my phone exploded, and lit my house on fire. my family is homeless. we’re living on the street begging for change. not even for a new home, but so i can pay apple to delete this off the app store. i mean this with all disrespect, no❤️
attributes.title: broke my phone
